name: MyAnimeList.net - Night Theme
description:
==== MyAnimeList.net - Night Theme ====
	Once based on MyAnimeList.net Dark Theme (styleID:5263) by user 6092
	But a lot has changed since then ;)
additional_info:
I would recommend using style 11479 along with this theme.

==== 3.3.x Changes ====
	3.3.1  - Fixed Profile, Seasonal Anime and Watch Anime pages.
	3.3.2  - Fixed a few more issues...
